JOB DESCRIPTION: Job description      Responsibilities include:      Understanding key components of legacy systems   Design, analysis, and implementation of product solutions   Troubleshooting of production issues   Work with Quality Assurance to verify functionality and address issues   Develop and deliver required technical documentation   Participate in project planning and design meetings   Resolve complex technical issues   Work effectively in an innovative, collaborative agile development environment        Professional Experience:      3+ years of experience in software development   Experience with software development life cycle (SDLC) and agile/iterative methodologies   Experience with relevant programming languages including but not limited to: Java, Angular.js, SQL and other scripting languages in Linux and Windows environments   Hands-on experience in the design, development and deployment of business software at scale   Experience with Agile Development Methodology   Experience with service-based architecture, RESTful services and building scalable micro-services   Experience with development of highly-available and fault-tolerant enterprise and web software deployments   Experience with compliance and risk management requirements (e.g. security, privacy, SSAE, PCI, HIPAA)   AWS(Amazon Web Service) - Experience developing cloud native applications   Experience with Kafka/Redis      Knowledge, Skills and Abilities:      Knowledge of Web standards, protocols and secure communications   Knowledge of data security and data privacy best practices, and their implementation into software solutions
